column2: "Hello, <%me>! Are you on a quest, too?"
"As you can see I've been able to get close to these guys, but still..."
"Yes, this person is my friend. I wonder if he understands..."
"As you can see, this is the state of things. I still haven't managed to grasp what they're saying."
"But these guys communicate by talking, so I think I can get through if I keep this up."
"Hm, the number of sounds is the same? Maybe the tone is different?"
"Sorry <%me>, I'm going to go chase after him!"
